:active.description: The index value corresponding to the current step
:active.description_zh: 当前步骤对应的索引值

direction.description_zh: 步骤条方向，可选值为 vertical

active-icon.description: The bottom icon corresponding to the current step, the optional values are shown in [Icon Component](https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/en-US/icon)
active-icon.description_zh: 当前步骤对应的底部图标，可选值见 [Icon 组件](https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/zh-CN/icon)

inactive-icon.description: The bottom icon that is not the corresponding to the current step, and the optional values can be found in [Icon Component](https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/en-US/icon)
inactive-icon.description_zh: 非当前步骤对应的底部图标，可选值见 [Icon 组件](https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/zh-CN/icon)

finish-icon.description: The bottom icon corresponding to the completed step, the priority is higher than 'inactive-icon', and the optional values can be found in [Icon Component](https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/en-US/icon)
finish-icon.description_zh: 已完成步骤对应的底部图标，优先级高于 `inactive-icon`，可选值见 [Icon 组件](https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/zh-CN/icon)

active-color.description: The color of the current and completed steps
active-color.description_zh: 当前步骤和已完成步骤的颜色

inactive-color.description: The color of the inactive step

icon-prefix.description: Icon class name prefix, equivalent to the [class-prefix property](https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/en-US/icon#props) of the Icon component
icon-prefix.description_zh: 图标类名前缀，等同于 Icon 组件的 [class-prefix 属性](https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/zh-CN/icon#props)

events.name: click-step
events.description: Triggered when you click on the title or icon of a step
events.description_zh: 点击步骤的标题或图标时触发

slots.name: inactive-icon
slots.description_zh: 自定义未激活状态图标

slots.name: finish-icon
slots.description: Customize the bottom icon for completed steps, with priority over inactive-icon
slots.description_zh: 自定义已完成步骤对应的底部图标，优先级高于 inactive-icon
